metadata.title: Set 'Default file format' to Enabled (PowerPoint Presentation (*pptx))
metadata.description: Set 'Default file format' to Enabled (PowerPoint Presentation (*pptx))

metadata.title: Set 'Make Hidden Markup Visible' to Enabled
metadata.description: Set 'Make Hidden Markup Visible' to Enabled

metadata.description: Set 'Scan Encrypted Macros in PowerPoint Open XML Presentations' to Enabled (Scan Encrypted Macros)

metadata.title: Set 'Run Programs' to Enabled (Disable (Don't Run Any Programs))
metadata.description: Set 'Run Programs' to Enabled (Disable (Don't Run Any Programs))

metadata.title: Set 'Turn Off File Validation' to Disabled
metadata.description: Set 'Turn Off File Validation' to Disabled

metadata.title: Set 'Unblock Automatic Download of Linked Images' to Disabled
metadata.description: Set 'Unblock Automatic Download of Linked Images' to Disabled

metadata.description: Set 'Disable Trust Bar Notification for Unsigned Application Add-ins and Block Them' to Enable

metadata.description: Set 'Trust Access to Visual Basic Project' to Disabled

metadata.description: Set 'Require That Application Add-ins are Signed by Trusted Publisher' to Enabled

metadata.title: Set 'Default File Block Behavior' to Enabled (Blocked files are not opened)
metadata.description: Set 'Default File Block Behavior' to Enabled (Blocked files are not opened)

metadata.description: Set 'Do not open from the Internet zone in Protected View' to Disabled

metadata.description: Set 'Turn off Protected View for attachments opened from Outlook' to Disabled

metadata.description: Set 'Do not open files in unsafe locations in Protected View' to Disabled

metadata.description: Set 'Allow Trusted Locations on the network' to Disabled
